original_text: Then Jacob continued on his journey and came to the land of the eastern peoples.
korean_text: 야곱이 길을 떠나 동방 사람의 땅에 이르러

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob continued on his journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 야곱은 그의 여정을 계속했습니다

sentences.original_text: and came to the land of the eastern peoples
